scripts.publish-vtv-pre: cd packages/vtv && yarn version --prerelease --pre-id=canary --no-git-tag-version && yarn publish --no-git-tag-version
scripts.packages:link:console: cd packages/console/node_modules && rm -rf vtv && ln -s ../../vtv vtv
scripts.packages:link:root: cd node_modules && rm -rf vtv && ln -s ../packages/vtv vtv && cd @resources && rm -rf console && ln -s ../../packages/console
scripts.packages:link:reset: rm node_modules/vtv node_modules/@resources/console packages/console/node_modules/vtv && yarn install
